articles.title: Kim Yong Il Greets PM of Saint Kitts and Nevis
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Greets PM of Saint Kitts and Nevis
Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Kim Yong Il Saturday sent a message of greetings to Denzil Douglas, Prime Minister of Saint Kitts and Nevis, on the occasion of the 26th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message wished him success in his work for the progress and development of the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Chun Meets CPLA Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Chun Meets CPLA Delegation
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Yong Chun, minister of the People's Armed Forces, met and had a conversation with the delegation of foreign affairs officials of the Chinese People's Liberation Army led by Maj. General Qian Lihua, director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the Ministry of National Defense, on Saturday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from CPLA Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from CPLA Delegation
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the delegation of foreign affairs officials of the Chinese People's Liberation Army on a visit to the DPRK.
					  Maj. General Qian Lihua, director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the Ministry of National Defense who is leading the delegation, handed the gift to Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Yong Chun, minister of the People's Armed Forces, Saturday.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation led by Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, left here Friday to participate in the 64th UN General Assembly.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations and Delegates Here
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations and Delegates Here
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates of Germany, Australia, Austria, Vietnam and Hong Kong and Taipei of China arrived here Saturday to participate in the 5th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair.
					 Arriving earlier were delegations and delegates of China, Sweden and Italy.

articles.title: State Science and Technology Commission to Be Set up in DPRK
articles.content:
State Science and Technology Commission to Be Set up in DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- A decree of the Supreme People's Assembly on setting up the State Science and Technology Commission of the DPRK was promulgated. 
					 The decree dated Sept. 18 said that the above-said commission would be set up.

articles.title: Documentary Film Shown
articles.content:
Documentary Film Shown
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Documentary film "Comrade Kim Jong Suk, the Great Communist Revolutionary Fighter and Woman Commander of Mt. Paektu" (2) was screened at the People's Palace of Culture on Saturday on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of her death.
					 It was watched by senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, leading officials of ministries and national institutions and provincial, city and county party committees.
					
					 The film shows historic scenes dealing with the great feats performed by Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese heroine, for the party and the revolution, the country and its people, true to President
						 Kim Il Sung's line of building the party, the state and the army and the immortal revolutionary exploits she performed by giving steady continuity to the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The film tells about facts on the indefatigable activities she conducted after her triumphant return home to firmly protect the personal safety of the President and uphold and defend his ideas and line under difficult and complicated situation after the country's liberation. 
					
					 It deals with the years of her dynamic leadership in which she energetically aroused the people to the building of a new country and worked heart and soul to train the People's Army to be the army of the leader and the party and develop it into an invincible army.
					
					 The film shows the revolutionary history of Kim Jong Suk woven with the boundless love for the country and the people and warm comradeship and the brilliant reality of the country in which her noble desire has come true under the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Tradition of Devotedly Defending Revolutionary Leadership Established by Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Tradition of Devotedly Defending Revolutionary Leadership Established by Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are highly praising anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk as the legendary bodyguard of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The title intensively signifies the exploits of Kim Jong Suk who established the great tradition of defending the leadership of revolution with very lives, a pride and heritage of the Korean revolution.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk met for the first time President Kim Il Sung in Sandaowan in the spring of Juche 24 (1935) and made her mind to believe only him anytime and anywhere and staunchly fight. Since then, she had devoted her all for defending the leadership of revolution with her very life.
					
					 She, with the thoroughgoing principle that any trifle mistake must not be allowed in defending the President, exposed and frustrated the sinister plots of the enemies to destroy the headquarters of the revolution at every step in bivouac and in the course of march during the anti-Japanese war.
					
					 She became a shield herself to protect his safety in fierce battles in the entrance to Dashahe, Fusong county town, Hongqihe and other areas.
					
					Having regarded it the noblest and most honorable task to defend the revolutionary idea of the President, she resolutely struggled against the renegades to revolution who were ideologically degenerated in the grim ordeals, scared by the bluff of the enemies.
					
					 She set an example in implementing orders of the President, too.
					
					 She, together with several sewing-team members, carried out within 20 days the task of making 600 suits of uniforms for a month. The spirit displayed by her in thoroughly implementing the President's orders is kept in minds of the Korean people as a brilliant paragon.
					
					 In the period of building a new country, too, she became of her own accord an eternal "bodyguard" of the President to pay a special attention to safeguarding him and devoted herself to the efforts for carrying out his line of national building.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk guarded with her very life President Kim Il Sung whom the Korean people held in high esteem for the first time in the 5,000-year-long history of the nation and thus gave the people the fortune of being blessed with illustrious leaders. Indeed, her precious exploit will shine long.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Exploits Performed in Army Building Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Exploits Performed in Army Building Lauded
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese heroine, performed immortal exploits in building the army all her life. They serve as eternal treasures of Songun Korea at present.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a signed article.  
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Her life was a noble one of a bodyguard as she set a shining example in protecting the leader at the risk of her life, thus contributing to the development of the Korean revolutionary armed forces into the army of the leader and that of the supreme commander. 
					
					 Devotedly defending the leader was a starting point of all her thoughts and activities and a maxim in her life and struggle. 
					
					 Her spirit of defending the leader reflected her unshakable faith and will that even not a single slip should be allowed in protecting the personal safety of President Kim Il Sung and her uncompromising spirit of dealing merciless blows without any slightest concession at the practices of defiling the leader's idea and prestige and line and policies. 
					
					 Her whole life was the one of a peerlessly great person during which she helped develop the Korean People's Army into an invincible army, glorifying the tradition of the revolutionary unity based on comradeship.
					
					 The comradeship displayed by her was the revolutionary philosophy centering on the leader based on her intense loyalty to the leader and the most ardent and purest mental power free from affectation and changing attitudes as is the case with arms. 
					
					 Her revolutionary life was a brilliant life of a woman commander of Mt. Paektu during which she performed immortal feats for the sovereignty and independence of the country and the strengthening of the revolutionary armed forces by tightly holding arms in her hand. 
					
					 Her great exploits performed in the history of army building served as a solid cornerstone whereby the Korean People's Army won one victory after another, firmly defending the party and the leader and the country and people in the rigorous years of the revolution. 
					
					 Her whole life was, at the same time, the life of a prominent revolutionary as she consolidated the deep roots of Songun Korea by creating the precious tradition of unity between the army and people, a source of the invincible might of the KPA. 
					
					 She gave birth to General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the lodestar over Mt. Paektu, in the period when the final victory of the great anti-Japanese war was drawing near. This marked a great auspicious event that promised a bright future of the Korean nation and a historic event which ushered in a new era of the great succession which made it possible for the Korean revolution to always win victory after victory under the banner of Songun. 
					
					 By holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as supreme commander of the revolutionary armed forces as desired by her, the KPA has grown to be a main force of the Songun revolution and a powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu capable of defeating any formidable enemy in the world, concludes the article.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Mongolian Figure
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Mongolian Figure
Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- The just cause of the Korean people is sure to be accomplished, declared B. Davaadorj, president of the Mongolian Association for the Study of Juche Idea-Songun Idea, when he was interviewed on September 18 before his departure from Pyongyang after winding up his visit to the DPRK.
					 He said that General Secretary Kim Jong Il, faithful successor to the cause of President Kim Il Sung, has wisely led the Korean people in their efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation while firmly defending the sovereignty of the country and the nation and socialism with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 He went on:
					
					Under the leadership of Kim Jong Il the Korean people are now waging a dynamic struggle to achieve fresh successes in all fields of economic construction.
					
					 The validity and vitality of the immortal Juche idea have been proved in practice.
					
					 The Juche idea is the great idea which indicates the profound philosophical principle.
					
					The Juche idea is now being briskly studied and disseminated worldwide as it gives perfect answers to all questions arising in carrying out the human cause of independence.
					
					Socialism is winning victory after victory in the DPRK as it is steadfastly guided by the Juche idea.
					
					The Korean people are convinced through their experience that there is nothing impossible for them when they advance under the uplifted banner of Juche.
					
					Unshakable is their will to build a thriving socialist nation under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Implementation of Inter-Korean Declarations Urged
articles.content:
Implementation of Inter-Korean Declarations Urged
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Sul, chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Ukraine, issued a statement on Sept. 16 on the occasions of the 29th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the second anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					 The statement said:
					
					 In order to wage a dynamic movement for national reunification all Koreans should remain true to the idea of "By our nation itself", the main spirit of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, and fully embody it. 
					
					 Clarified in the declarations are all theoretical and practical problems arising in achieving the reunification of the country and ways for realizing the reunification in the most reasonable way at the earliest possible date.
					
					 The declarations also comprehensively deal with all matters of cooperation between the north and the south for promoting common interests and co-prosperity and development, the statement noted, and continued: 
					
					 The proposal for founding the DFRK is the most just way for the Korean people to achieve national reunification by themselves free from foreign interference.
					
					 Upholding and implementing the declarations is the only way of improving the inter-Korean relations and steadily and dynamically advancing the cause of national reunification, concluded the statement.

articles.title: Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Egypt
articles.content:
Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Egypt
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- An Egyptian  preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung was formed in Cairo on September 10.
					 Youssef Amin Wali, vice-chairman of the National Democratic Party of Egypt, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events including meeting, seminar and film show for praising the immortal feats of Kim Il Sung till April 15 of 2012.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente de delegacion militar de China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente de delegacion militar de China
Pyongyang, 19 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio presente que le dirigiera la delegacion de los funcionarios de asuntos exteriores del Ejercito Popular de Liberacion de China encabezada por el mayor general Qian Lihua, director de la Oficina de los Asuntos Exteriores del Ministerio de Defensa Nacional, de  vista en Corea.
					El titular de la delegacion lo entrego el dia 19 a Kim Yong Chun, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares y vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea.

articles.title: Parte de Pyongyang delegacion de RPDC a Asamblea General de ONU
articles.content:
Parte de Pyongyang delegacion de RPDC a Asamblea General de ONU
Pyongyang, 19 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Partio el dia 18 de esta capital la delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea encabezada por el viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Pak Kil Yon, para participar en el 64o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU.

articles.title: Establecido Comite Estatal de Ciencias y Tecnologias
articles.content:
Establecido Comite Estatal de Ciencias y Tecnologias
Pyongyang, 19 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea emitio el dia 18 un decreto sobre el establecimiento del Comite Estatal de Ciencias y Tecnologias de la RPDC.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun elogia proezas de Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun elogia proezas de Kim Jong Suk 
  Pyongyang, 19 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Hoy dia, brillan como eterno tesoro de Corea del Songun (priorizacion militar) las inmortales proezas de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa, Kim Jong Suk, acumuladas en la fundacion del ejercito dedicando toda su vida.
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual del dia 19 y continua:
					
					  La vida de Kim Jong Suk fue la vida de la soldado corps quien creo el noble ejemplo de defender a ultranza al lider y fortalecio las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de Corea como el ejercito del Lider y del Comandante Supremo.
					
					  La defensa a costa de la vida al lider fue el punto de partida de todos los pensamientos y actividades de ella y la maxima de su vida y lucha.
					
					  El espiritu de tal defensa fue la firme conviccion y voluntad de no permitir ni un error minimo en la labor para asegurar la seguridad del Presidente    Kim Il Sung, y la intransigencia sin conciliacion alguna con respecto a los actos de desacreditar la idea, el prestigio, la linea y la orientacion del Presidente.
					
					  Ella hizo brillar la tradicion de la unidad revolucionaria basada en la camaraderia y formo al Ejercito Popular de Corea (EPC) como invencibles fuerzas armadas.
					
					  La camaraderia de la Heroina fue la filosofia revolucionaria centrada en el lider, que se basa en la infinita fidelidad a este, y la mas ardiente potencia espiritual que no conoce la ficcion ni la traicion como el fusil.
					
					  La vida revolucionaria de ella es la brillante trayectoria de la generala del monte Paektu quien al tomar firmemente el fusil realizo inmortales proezas para la soberania e independencia de la patria y el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					  Sus grandes hazanas acumuladas en la historia de la construccion del ejercito sirvieron de la firme base que permitio al EPC lograr victoria tras victoria defendiendo con firmeza al partido, el lider, la patria y el pueblo en las severas decadas de la revolucion.
					
					  Tambien, la vida de ella es la de la distinguida revolucionaria quien consolido la base de la Corea del Songun creando la preciosa tradicion de la unidad entre el ejercito y el pueblo, fuente de la invencible fuerza del EPC.
					
					  En el periodo cuando se aproximaba el triunfo final de la guerra antijaponesa, Kim Jong Suk crio a su hijo Kim Jong Il como estrella luz del monte Paektu, lo cual fue un gran jubilo que prometio el  radiante futuro de la nacion coreana y un evento historico que abrio la nueva epoca de la gran sucesion para que la revolucion coreana saliera siempre victoriosa bajo la bandera del Songun.
					
					  Como deseaba ella, el Ejercito Popular de Corea enaltecio al Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias y asi crecio como grueso de la revolucion del Songun y poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu, capaz de vencer a cualquier enemigo potente.
